sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react" import Footer from "../../components/Footer/footer.js" import Rover from "../../images/rover.svg" import SubTitle from "../../subTitle.txt" import "./home.sass" export default class Home extends Component { componentDidMount(){ fetch(SubTitle) .then(r => r.text()) .then(t => this.setState({subTitle: t}) ) } dressNum(n){ return n ? n.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",") : n } handleImageLoaded() { this.setState({ imageStatus: "loaded" }) // this will allow things to load in their proper place / time. like the footer, who needs this images size to determine position. } render() { return (
{this.props.status.userName && <>

Welcome, {this.props.status.userName} !

}

• Mission Manifest •

{ !this.props.manifest.mission_manifest &&

?


} { this.props.manifest.mission_manifest &&

Launch Date: {this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.launch_date}

Landing Date: {this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.landing_date}

Last Updated: {this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.max_date}

Martian Days("sols"):  {this.dressNum(this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.max_sol)}

Status: {this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.status}

Total Photos:  {this.dressNum(this.props.manifest.mission_manifest.total_photos)}


}

• Community Activity •

{ !this.props.manifest.visits &&

?


} { this.props.manifest.visits &&

Visits({this.props.manifest.visits})

Saved Images({this.props.manifest.images_saved})

Images Viewed({this.props.manifest.images_viewed})



Our Curiosity

{this.state.subTitle}


}
) } }
